readme.description: The Dynamixel software package provides RoadNarrows software extensions to Robotis Dynamixel servos. Specifically, an on-target Dynamixel library plus the BotSense client-server modules for operation and monitoring of a Dynamixel chain over IP.
readme.dependencies:
RoadNarrows Required Packages:
rnmake
librnr
libserial
netmsgs
botsense
Robotis Required Hardware:
USB2Dynamixel dongle
Dynamixel servos
